bike.description: Specialized A1 Premium Aluminum, 29er frame, fully butted w/ tapered headtube, forged dropouts, alloy replaceable der. hanger

Integrated 1-1/8" w/ lower bearing reducer, Campy-style, full cartridge bearings

Specialized Body Geometry XCT, Kraton rubber w/ gel, closed end, 132mm, lock-on

KMC X-9, 9-speed w/ reusable Missing Link

Composite platform, w/ reflectors, 9/16"

Specialized MTB disc hub, alloy, Hi Lo flange, RCC ball bearing system, steel axle, steel cassette body, QR, 32h
